title: l&s - cigarettes
description:
L&S - Cigaretts is an University project I did for the lecture Responsive Webdesign.
The Goal was to create a Landingpage for a product of your choice and show it in an opposite context.

title: digital media intranet redesign
description: As a part of an University project I had the challenge to create aninteractive prototype for the faculty of Digital Media.
